1011100011110101 1101011011111101 1 -> sum: 1000111111110011, cout: 1

1100011000100110 0010010000101001 0 -> sum: 1110101001001111, cout: 0

0011110111111010 0000000111001001 0 -> sum: 0011111111000011, cout: 0
